languages.text: По приказу Лорд-капитана на Янусе было организовано трехдневное всепланетное моление о спасении вотчины Его из лап врагов Человечества. Ритуалы и литании произвели впечатление на обывателей агромира: вскоре начали приходить отчеты о том, что члены подполья утратили расположение простого населения и вынуждены были покинуть крупные поселения.

traits.locale_text: По приказу Лорд-капитана на Янусе было организовано трехдневное всепланетное моление о спасении вотчины Его из лап врагов Человечества. Ритуалы и литании произвели впечатление на обывателей агромира: вскоре начали приходить отчеты о том, что члены подполья утратили расположение простого населения и вынуждены были покинуть крупные поселения.

languages.text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.
languages.original_text: По приказу Лорд-капитана на Янусе было организовано трехдневное всепланетное моление о спасении вотчины Его из лап врагов Человечества. Ритуалы и литании произвели впечатление на обывателей агромира: вскоре начали приходить отчеты о том, что члены подполья утратили расположение простого населения и вынуждены были покинуть крупные поселения.

traits.locale_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

languages.text: 在舰长大人的命令下，这颗行星每天都要举行三次祈祷仪式。加努斯的全体居民都要参加仪式，进行祈祷，祈求神皇将这颗行星从人类之敌的魔掌中拯救出来。这样的祈祷仪式，对这个农业世界的居民都产生了影响。很快，就有报告声称，说那些异端团体的成员已经失去了农奴们的支持，不得不放弃这个世界上的主要定居点。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

traits.locale_text: 在舰长大人的命令下，这颗行星每天都要举行三次祈祷仪式。加努斯的全体居民都要参加仪式，进行祈祷，祈求神皇将这颗行星从人类之敌的魔掌中拯救出来。这样的祈祷仪式，对这个农业世界的居民都产生了影响。很快，就有报告声称，说那些异端团体的成员已经失去了农民们的支持，不得不放弃这个世界上的主要定居点。

languages.text: Por orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, se celebraron servicios religiosos en todo el planeta tres veces al día en los que la población de Janus pedía por que sus tierras quedaran libres de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Los rituales y las letanías surtieron efecto en los habitantes del mundo agrícola. Pronto empezaron a llegar informes de que los agentes clandestinos del planeta habían perdido el apoyo del campesinado y se habían visto obligados a huir de los principales asentamientos del mundo.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

traits.locale_text: Por orden de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, se celebraron servicios religiosos en todo el planeta tres veces al día en los que la población de Janus pedía por que sus tierras quedaran libres de los enemigos de la Humanidad. Los rituales y las letanías surtieron efecto en los habitantes del mundo agrícola. Pronto empezaron a llegar informes de que los agentes clandestinos del planeta habían perdido el apoyo del campesinado y se habían visto obligados a huir de los principales asentamientos del mundo.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンの命により、惑星全土で日に三度の祈祷が行われた。ヤヌスの民は人類の敵からこの星が解放されるようデリヴァランスへ祈りを捧げた。儀式と連祷は功を奏し、反体制勢力のメンバーは農業惑星の住民たちからの支援を失ったために惑星の主要居住地から立ち退かざるをえなくなったという報告がたちまち上がった。
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンの命により、惑星全土で日に三度の祈祷が行われた。ヤヌスの民は人類の敵からこの星が解放されるようデリヴァランスへ祈りを捧げた。儀式と連祷は功を奏し、反体制勢力のメンバーは農業惑星の住民たちからの支援を失ったために惑星の主要居住地から立ち退かざるをえなくなったという報告がたちまち上がった。

languages.text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captain wurden drei planetenweite Gebetsgottesdienste abgehalten, bei denen die Bevölkerung von Janus dafür gebetet hat, Sein Land aus den Krallen der Feinde der Menschheit zu befreien. Die Rituale und Litaneien hatten spürbare Auswirkungen auf die Einwohner der Agrarwelt – Berichten zufolge verloren die Mitglieder des Untergrunds die Unterstützung der Bauernschaft und sahen sich gezwungen, die größeren Ansiedlungen der Welt zu verlassen.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

traits.locale_text: Auf Befehl des Lord Captain wurden drei planetenweite Gebetsgottesdienste abgehalten, bei denen die Bevölkerung von Janus dafür gebetet hat, Sein Land aus den Krallen der Feinde der Menschheit zu befreien. Die Rituale und Litaneien hatten spürbare Auswirkungen auf die Einwohner der Agrarwelt – Berichten zufolge verloren die Mitglieder des Untergrunds die Unterstützung der Bauernschaft und sahen sich gezwungen, die größeren Ansiedlungen der Welt zu verlassen.

languages.text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, trois services religieux furent tenus par jour, services au cours desquels la population de Janus pria pour que les terres de l'Empereur soient délivrées de l'emprise des ennemis de l'humanité. Les rituels et litanies eurent un effet positif sur les habitants de l'agri-monde : d'après les rapports récents, les rebelles auraient perdu le soutien de la paysannerie et été forcés à quitter les villages majeurs.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.

traits.locale_text: Sur ordre {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, trois services religieux furent tenus par jour, services au cours desquels la population de Janus pria pour que les terres de l'Empereur soient délivrées de l'emprise des ennemis de l'humanité. Les rituels et litanies eurent un effet positif sur les habitants de l'agri-monde : d'après les rapports récents, les rebelles auraient perdu le soutien de la paysannerie et été forcés à quitter les villages majeurs.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan'ın buyruğuyla her gün üç defa gezegen çapında dua törenleri düzenlendi. Janus halkı, O'nun topraklarının İnsanlığın düşmanlarının pençesinden kurtulması için dua etti. Bu türden törenler, zirai dünyanın sakinleri üzerinde tesirini gösterdi. Kısa sürede isyancıların köylülerin desteğini kaybettikleri ve dünyanın ana yerleşimlerini terk etmek zorunda kaldıkları raporları gelmeye başladı.
languages.original_text: On the Lord Captain's orders, thrice-daily planet-wide prayer services were held, in which the population of Janus prayed for the deliverance of His land from the clutches of the enemies of Humanity. The rituals and litanies had an effect on the agri-world's inhabitants — reports soon began to arrive that the members of the underground had lost the support of the peasantry and had been forced to abandon the world's major settlements.
